sentences.sContent: Aunt Isabella sent papa a beautiful lock of his hair; it was lighter than mine--more flaxen, and quite as fine.
sentences.sContent_eng: Aunt Isabella sent papa a beautiful lock of his hair; it was lighter than mine--more flaxen, and quite as fine.
sentences.sCn: 伊莎贝拉姑姑给过爸爸一绺他的美丽的头发；比我的头发颜色还浅——更淡黄些，而且也相当细。

sentences.sContent: She was spinning white flaxen thread, which ran from her spinning wheel down to a pile around her feet, then on down the slope, like a creek.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was spinning white flaxen thread, which ran from her spinning wheel down to a pile around her feet, then on down the slope, like a creek.
sentences.sCn: 她正在纺着白色的亚麻线，线从她的纺轮里跑出来，在她的脚边堆成一堆，然后跑下雪泥地，像一条小溪。

sentences.sContent: This is because postmenopausal women rarely retain the flaxen locks of their youth, of course eventually becoming grey grannies.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is because postmenopausal women rarely retain the flaxen locks of their youth, of course eventually becoming grey grannies.
sentences.sCn: 这也是为什么绝经后的女性很少能保留她们少女时代淡黄色的头发，而变成白头发的老奶奶。

synos.tran: 淡黄色的；亚麻的；亚麻色的

words.tran: 亚麻；亚麻纤维；亚麻布；亚麻织品

trans.tranCn: 淡黄色的；亚麻的；亚麻色的
trans.tranOther: flaxen hair is light yellow in colour
